activities:
Merge eClinical collects and stores in secure databases clinical trial data on behalf of our clients.  This information is anonymized and is not analyzed or otherwise used by Merge eClinical.  At the end of each clinical trial study, copies of the data are transferred to the sponsor (client) and the individual sites that originally collected that data.  The database is archived and kept off-line for a period of 5 years.
Merge eClinical also collects and processes employee personal data to allow for the proper business administration of Merge eClinical.
